go_data.justification: Arl6IP1 has the ability to shape the mammalian ER membrane in a reticulon-like fashion
Roles in protein transport and ER function have also been ascribed to ARL6IP1
Arl6IP1 has the ability to shape the mammalian ER membrane in a reticulon-like fashion and roles in ER function have been ascribed to ARL6IP1
